body: JEANS JU My parents died together in a sudden accident. In this way, our sister and brother became a family of just two people. My feelings for me grew day by day, and one day I finally told my sister the forbidden feelings LINN / I love you too Riku ... My sister kindly responded to my feelings Beyond
For those who are not good at NTR, a chara man died in an accident on the way to a drinking party and illustrated the world line
